meanings.sent1: The respirometric test results showed how well the organism was breathing.
meanings.sent2: The scientist conducted a respirometric experiment to study the breathing patterns of the fish.
meanings.sent3: The respirometric analysis of the patient's lungs revealed surprising data.
meanings.sent4: Her respirometric approach to understanding lung function was innovative.
meanings.sent5: The respirometric measurements provided valuable insights into respiratory health.

meanings.sent1: The respirometric equipment helped in monitoring the patient's breathing rate.
meanings.sent2: Respirometric studies are essential in understanding the respiratory system.
meanings.sent3: The respirometric assessment of the athlete's lung capacity was impressive.
meanings.sent4: His respirometric analysis of the air quality was meticulous.
meanings.sent5: The respirometric evaluation indicated a need for further respiratory tests.

meanings.definition: Using respirometry to study metabolic processes.
meanings.sent1: The respirometric revealed the metabolic rate of the organism.
meanings.sent2: Researchers used respirometric to investigate the metabolic changes in cells.
meanings.sent3: The respirometric in the lab was accidentally knocked over during the experiment.
meanings.sent4: Her respirometric study on metabolic processes won her a science award.
meanings.sent5: The respirometric data provided valuable insights into the organism's metabolism.
